title: I found a glitch in this game!
content:
In level 7, there are two shootable walls that obviously aren't supposed to be shootable. They're in the bathroom tile room. Shoot the walls near one of the tree. If you destroy one wall, you just found an other. Shoot thew stone wall and you will not only see an soda machine, but also see the one of the rooms you have to enter. The soda machine itself is not shootable nor walkthrough. If you really want to, buy something from the bathroom tile room by performing this glitch. (you can also buy a purple potion then kill the ear monster in the stone wall room with a jelly bomb from the bathroom tile room by performing this glitch.)Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]
